description: Deletes a flow. Before you can delete a flow, you must stop the flow.

parameters.name: FlowArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the flow that you want to delete.

nested_items.name: FlowArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the flow that was deleted.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the flow when the DeleteFlow process begins.
